title: API in Golang with Gin
description: Bienvenue dans ce cours sur les API.

body.raw:
Create an API in PHP

Tutorial Basic
Before start, make sure you have [Composer](https://getcomposer.org/download/) install. ## Install Gin ```sh mkdir api-go cd api-go go mod init api-go go get -u github.com/gin-gonic/gin ``` ### Basic API code in Golang ```go package main import ( "github.com/gin-gonic/gin" "net/http" ) type Article struct { ID int `json:"id"` Title string `json:"title"` Content string `json:"content"` } var articles = []Article{ {ID: 1, Title: "Go API", Content: "Introduction Ã  Gin"}, } func main() { r := gin.Default() r.GET("/articles", func(c *gin.Context) { c.JSON(http.StatusOK, articles) }) r.POST("/articles", func(c *gin.Context) { var newArticle Article if err := c.ShouldBindJSON(&newArticle); err == nil { articles = append(articles, newArticle) c.JSON(http.StatusCreated, newArticle) } else { c.JSON(http.StatusBadRequest, gin.H{"error": err.Error()}) } }) r.Run(":8080") } ```
### API in NodeJs Build API with NodeJs ### API in PHP The marketing site with landing pages. ### API in Golang The dashboard with auth and subscriptions. ### API in Python The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX. ### API in TypeScript The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX.
